div.p: You are invited to a Zoom Meeting at Bigelow Laboratory for Ocean Sciences

div.h2: Can I call from outside of the US?
div.p: Yes, international numbers are available here: https://zoom.us/zoomconference
Click the Join Audio or Unmute button in the bottom left corner of the Zoom window.
If using a Zoom Room, click on the video icon on the iPad.
Click the Start Video button in the bottom left corner of the Zoom window.
If using a Zoom Room, click on the video icon on the iPad.
Turn off your video and close unnecessary desktop applications.
div.h2: The Zoom Cart is not plugged in/on

ol.li: Plug the power cable into an outlet
Plug in the ethernet cable (if possible; not necessary)
Turn on the TV using the remote or button on the TV
After the Mac boots and you see the Zoom screen, tap "Retry" on the control tablet
